div.p: This code system http://nhn.no/fhir/nilar/CodeSystem/pvk-outcome-cs defines the following codes:

tr.td: A restriction exist for the actual health care provider, preventing access to all data for the person.
A restriction exist for all health care providers, preventing access to all data for the person.
The person has a reservatioan against being recorded and hence no data is available.

description.value: A code that indicates how privacy settings (PVK) may have affected the outcome.

definition.value: A restriction exist for the actual health care provider, preventing access to all data for the person.
A restriction exist for all health care providers, preventing access to all data for the person.
The person has a reservatioan against being recorded and hence no data is available.
